meaningMnemonic: A <radical>viking</radical> with a <radical>mouth</radical> <radical>towel</radical> is a totally <kanji>normal</kanji> thing. It's <kanji>ordinary</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: It's <kanji>normal</kanji> for a viking to have a mouth towel, but your sloppy farmhand friend <reading>Joe</reading>(じょう) has a mouth towel too. That's a habit that's only <kanji>normal</kanji> for vikings, so why does he have one?
